title: URAM - Font ID help - Sans Serif
content:
I’d very much appreciate any help in identifying this font. The ’R’ and ’G’ seem like they would be most helpful in identifying this font. Thanks in advance for any help you can offer. Cheers!

author: Sopwith

comments.content:
Hi Mike,

I think you are absolutely right. Thanks alot!

Cheers,
